game.name: Guildamation
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 터치 전용 옵션, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Guildamation is a pixel-art idle RPG where you build a guild of heroes, craft powerful gear, and guide their actions through customizable battle orders. Combine strategy and automation to conquer dungeons, gather loot, and shape your guild’s destiny.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Guildamation is a pixel-art idle RPG where you build a guild of heroes, craft powerful gear, and guide their actions through customizable battle orders. Combine strategy and automation to conquer dungeons, gather loot, and shape your guild’s destiny.
